intro: Fuel your competitive spirit with Asphalt Legends!
description: Speed through intense arcade races, perform jaw-dropping stunts, and charge to victory in the coolest hypercars! Join global multiplayer races, challenge up to 7 opponents across platforms, or dominate in local split-screen. Connect with friends, create private lobbies, and join racing Clubs for exclusive rewards. Choose from over 250 hypercars such as Ferrari and Porsche, conquer iconic tracks worldwide, and enjoy high-speed racing with detailed vehicles and stunning effects. Customize your ride with unique paint, rims, and parts to showcase your style on the road to racing greatness!
